llm.feedback:
Up | 4–6 months | AI-enabled wealth/platforms (Pacaso and Range‑AI) reprice risk and broaden access to private/alternative assets as part of a broader risk-taking framework | Watch Pacaso metrics like multiple destinations and rising co-ownership penetration (UPV3X2MQ6) as early indicators of cross-asset liquidity and private-asset demand shifts | 25–35%  
Up | 0–3 months | Regime A tilt toward AI-driven productivity with contained displacement would sustain trend earnings upside and value-oriented discipline | Watch for a breakthrough in AI productivity adoption that meaningfully accelerates deployment without protracted unemployment (NL5YYTLF2) | 25–35%  
Down | 0–3 weeks | Tariff pass-through to consumer prices and auto pricing intensifies inflationary pressure on new-vehicle pricing | Watch for tariffs remaining above 10% of imports and mapping into durable goods inflation (EPJYXB7DX)(0J41Q7KTX)(S15934PBQ) | 20–30%  
Down | 2–4 months | Policy signaling delays or a hawkish Jackson Hole surprise could push rates higher, weakening the base-case tilt toward Regime A | Watch for Jackson Hole guidance and current policy path as indicated by J99EM2TPZ and T1QE6JPIX | 20–30%
